Uses of Package
de.intarsys.security.smartcard.card

  • Packages that use de.intarsys.security.smartcard.card 
    Package Description
    de.intarsys.security.smartcard.card  
    de.intarsys.security.smartcard.card.standard  
    de.intarsys.security.smartcard.smartcardio  
  • Classes in de.intarsys.security.smartcard.card used by de.intarsys.security.smartcard.card 
    Class and Description
    ActiveCardConnectionMonitor.State 
    ATR
    A wrapper for the "Answer to reset" byte stream.
    CardConnectionDetector.Result 
    CardConnectionMonitor
    Abstract superclass to ease the implementation of monitors that connect to a card upon insertion.
    CardException
    An exception in the card abstraction layer.
    CardSystemMonitor
    Monitors a ICardSystem's ICardTerminal and ICard instances and dispatches all events to an CardSystemMonitor.ICardSystemListener.
    CardSystemMonitor.ICardSystemListener
    A callback interface for events generated by the CardSystemMonitor.
    CommonCard.ConnectTask 
    CommonCardSystem
    Abstract superclass for implementing ICardSystem.
    CommonCardTransmitter
    Abstract superclass for implementing ICardTransmitter
    EnumCardState
    The enumeration of supported states for a ICard.
    EnumCardTerminalState
    The enumeration of supported states for a ICardTerminal.
    ICard
    The abstraction of a smartcard inserted in an ICardTerminal.
    ICardConnection
    The abstraction of a connection opened to an ICard.
    ICardConnectionFilter
    A filter for ICardConnection instances.
    ICardSystem
    The abstraction of the smartcard environment connected to the system.
    ICardTerminal
    The abstraction of a single terminal, optionally containing a token, connected to the system.
    ICardTerminalFilter
    A filter for ICardTerminal instances.
    ICardTransmitter
    An object that can transmit APDUs from/to an ICard.
    ICloseCallback
    The ICloseCallback is used to inform client code about the result of an asynchronous attempt to close a ICardConnection.
    IConnectionCallback
    The IConnectionCallback is used to inform client code about the result of an asynchronous attempt to connect to an ICard.
    ITransactionCallback
    The ITransactionCallback is used to inform client code about the result of an asynchronous attempt to open a transaction on a ICardConnection.
    RegexCardTerminalFilter 
    RequestAPDU
    The data object sent to the ICard.
    ResponseAPDU
    The data object received from the ICard.

    Abstract superclass for implementing ICardSystem.
    CommonCardTerminal
    Abstract superclass for implementing ICardTerminal To provide asynchronous communication with cards, the card terminal may delegate tasks to an executor.
    EnumCardState
    The enumeration of supported states for a ICard.
    ICard
    The abstraction of a smartcard inserted in an ICardTerminal.
